name: Disarm Data Bomb
description: Disarm a databomb.

name: Jack Out
description: Jack out of the Matrix and reboot device being used.

name: Control Device
description: Perform an action through a device you control.

name: Set Data Bomb
description: Set a data bomb.

name: Garbage In/Out
description: Confuse a device's input and output commands.

name: Hide
description: Hide in the Matrix.

name: Spoof Command
description: Send a command that the device thinks is a legitimate one from its owner.

name: Intercept Traffic
description: User is aware of Matrix actions the target is going to use.

name: Format Device
description: Device shuts down and immediately reboots.

name: Trace Icon
description: Find the physical location of a device or persona in the Matrix.

name: Tag Icon
description: Visibly tag a target on a PAN with AROs.

name: Reduce Noise
description: Use RCC to reduce noise between user and vehicles/drones.

name: Reboot Device
description: Device shuts down and immediately reboots.

name: Matrix Perception
description: Analyze a Matrix object or scan your vicinity.

name: Offer Mark
description: Offer other icons a mark on your device.

name: Analyze Icon
description: Threat highlighting.

name: Edit File
description: Create, change, copy, delete, or protect any kind of file.

name: Lock-On
description: Detect wireless signals for a target lock.

name: Send Message
description: Lend processing power to increase speed of a persona.

name: Jam Signals
description: Prevents device from calling or sending messages.

name: Jammer
description: Turn wireless device you are using into a local jammer.

name: Erase Mark
description: Remove mark on your persona or on another icon.

name: Crash Program
description: Send harmful instructions to target causing Matrix damage.

name: Crack File
description: Remove the protection from a file.
